text: Merchants who add 3D content to thier stores see a 94% conversion lift.

text: 61% of consumers say they prefer retailers with AR experiences.

text: Augmented Reality boost online shopping  sales up to 200%.

text: Consumers are 11 times more likely to buy furniture if they can use Augmented Reality first to see how to looks within their home.
research: A study from last year by Apple

text: Consumers are willing to pay as much as 40% more for a product that can be tried through Augmented Reality.

text: 58% of consumers who use Augmented Reality believe these tools have prevented them from having to make a return.
